title: Shakespeare in the Park: Much Ado About Nothing
preview: New York’s most treasured summer tradition, free Shakespeare in the Park, celebrates its 52nd season in Central Park’s famous Delacorte Theater with two of the Bard’s greatest works, MUCH ADO ABOUT NOTHING and KING LEAR. Love and madness, laughter and tragedy combine for a uniquely thrilling season of exciting theater and exceptional performances under the stars.
